text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-QueryParameterValue where concept is-a _QueryParameterValue

name: IssueFilterCode
title: IssueFilterCode
description: **Description:**Indicates how result sets should be filtered based on whether they have associated issues.
